meanings.definition: Moving or situated in an upward direction.
meanings.sent1: The kite flew upalong in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The balloons floated upalong towards the clouds.
meanings.sent3: The rocket went upalong so fast, it almost reached the stars!
meanings.sent4: Her spirits soared upalong like a bird taking flight.
meanings.sent5: The elevator carried us upalong to the top floor.

meanings.definition: To move or position something in an upward direction.
meanings.sent1: She carefully upalongs the painting on the wall.
meanings.sent2: He upalongs the flag on the pole every morning.
meanings.sent3: The magician upalongs the wand and makes magic happen!
meanings.sent4: The gardener upalongs the plant to catch more sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Please upalong the box to the top shelf for me.

meanings.definition: In a state of being upright or vertical.
meanings.sent1: The tree stood upalong in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The skyscraper was built upalong and reached the clouds.
meanings.sent3: The giraffe looked upalong at the tall tree, wishing for a snack.
meanings.sent4: The mountain rose upalong like a giant sleeping beast.
meanings.sent5: The candle burned upalong, casting a warm glow in the room.
